duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement customized fitness programs for women in a small group setting, focusing on strength, mobility, and stability training.
Assess client movement patterns, range of motion, and mobility to create personalized training plans.
Provide in-house training adhering to Studio Fit's brand for new clients and group members.
Utilize calisthenics, body weight exercises, and various weights and props for strength and functional training.
Create and lead energetic, engaging, and effective group fitness sessions for dedicated women clients.

education_certification.credential: Certification in Group Fitness and Personal Training (Bachelor's degree in Health & Fitness related field preferred)
